forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 44F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
